message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a fantastic product that I believe you'll find valuable. I'm willing to part with it for $11,000.  I think this is a fair price considering the value it will bring to you.

Thanks for the offer, Alice! I appreciate you considering my budget. I'm really interested in this product but $11,000 is a bit higher than I'm aiming for right now. I'd be willing to pay $9,500 for it.  Let me know what you think!

Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but $9,500 is a bit too low for me to consider.  How about we meet in the middle at $10,250? I'm confident you'll be happy with the value you're getting.
